mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_INFO( BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENTS, USER_ID ) values( #{board_title}, #{board_writer}, #{board_contents}, #{user_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_REGDATE FROM COMMUNITY_INFO
SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_REGDATE, USER_ID FROM COMMUNITY_INFO WHERE BOARD_SEQ=#{board_seq}
SELECT * FROM(SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, c.* FROM allforyou.COMMUNITY_INFO c, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP ORDER BY BOARD_REGDATE DESC) SUB WHERE SUB.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
